did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: ILR School Office of Student Services MacIntyre Honors and Awards Program, 2003
did.origination:
New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations (NYSSILR);
Office of Student Services
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Program for the ILR School's MacIntyre Honors and Awards Dinner on April 15, 2003.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The MacIntyre Honors and Awards Dinner is named for Duncan MacIntyre, a teacher of Labor Economics in the ILR School from 1950 to 1975. The annual event recognizes the achievements of ILR faculty and students.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a program for the ILR School's MacIntyre Honors and Awards Dinner on April 15, 2003.
